title: News24.com | Scores of vehicles stopped on the road, many turned back for not having travelling permission
description: The Minister of Transport Fikile Mbalula has continued to roll-out operations such as road-blocks, despite the relaxation of regulations, to ensure that the novel coronavirus does not spread through the public transport system during the lockdown.
content:
Roadblocks and other measures were put in place on Friday and Saturday to ensure adherence to the regulations on public transport during the lockdown period set by Transport Minister Fikile Mbalula. 
In a series of tweets, Mbalula indicated the various opera… [+1188 chars]
